introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is ぐうぜん, which you will often hear in situations where unexpected events occur or when talking about coincidences.
meaning_explanation_english: The word ぐうぜん means an unexpected event or coincidence. It describes something that happens by chance, without any prior planning or intention. This word is often used when something surprising or improbable occurs without anticipation.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 偶発 : ぐうはつ : sudden outbreak
synonym_explanation:
The most common synonyms of the word ぐうぜん are ふい and ぐうはつ. 
* ふい implies something happening suddenly or without warning, focusing more on the element of surprise.
* ぐうはつ refers to something that occurs spontaneously or accidentally, often with a bit of unpredictability.
antonyms: 必然 : ひつぜん : inevitable
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word ぐうぜん is ひつぜん, which refers to something that is inevitable or bound to happen, emphasizing the idea of certainty and predictability.

example_sentences.kanji: 昨日、偶然に友達に会った。
example_sentences.furigana: 昨日(きのう)、偶然(ぐうぜん)に友達(ともだち)に会(あ)った。

translations.EN: Yesterday, I bumped into a friend by chance.
translations.ID: Kemarin, saya bertemu teman secara kebetulan.
translations.ES: Ayer me encontré con un amigo por casualidad.
translations.VI: Hôm qua, tôi tình cờ gặp một người bạn.
translations.FR: Hier, j'ai rencontré un ami par hasard.
translations.BN: গতকাল, আমি একটি বন্ধুর সাথে আকস্মিকভাবে দেখা করলাম।
translations.ZH: 昨天，我偶然遇到了一位朋友。
translations.TL: Kahapon, nakatagpo ko ang isang kaibigan nang hindi inaasahan.
translations.MY: မနေ့က အသိအဆန်မိသားစုကို တွေ့မိတယ်။
translations.HI: कल, एक दोस्त से अचानक मुलाकात हो गई।
translations.FA: دیروز، به طور تصادفی با دوستم برخورد کردم.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼と偶然のため会った。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)と偶然(ぐうぜん)のため会(あ)った。

translations.VI: Tôi gặp anh ấy do tình cờ.
translations.MY: မိမိကို လက်တွေ့ကာ ကိုယ်တိုင်တွေ့ဆုံလိုက်သည်။
translations.FA: من او را به طور تصادفی ملاقات کردم.

example_sentences.kanji: 偶然にペンを見つけました。
example_sentences.furigana: 偶然(ぐうぜん)にペンを見つけました。

translations.EN: I happened to find a pen.
translations.VI: Tôi tình cờ tìm thấy một cây bút.
translations.FR: J'ai trouvé un stylo par hasard.
translations.NE: मैले संयोगले एउटा कलम फेला पारेँ।
translations.BN: আমি ঘটনাক্রমে একটি কলম খুঁজে পেয়েছি।
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်ကတိုက်ဆိုင်ကဖြစ်လို့ ဘောပင်တစ်ချောင်းတွေ့ခဲ့တယ်။
translations.HI: मुझे संयोग से एक पेन मिला।
translations.FA: من به طور تصادفی یک خودکار پیدا کردم.

translations.MY: ဒါက ဆန်းကျယ်မှုပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 駅(えき)で偶然(ぐうぜん)出会(であ)った。

translations.EN: I ran into him by chance at the station.
translations.ID: Saya bertemu dengannya secara kebetulan di stasiun.
translations.ES: Me encontré con él por casualidad en la estación.
translations.VI: Tôi tình cờ gặp anh ấy ở nhà ga.
translations.FR: Je l'ai rencontré par hasard à la gare.
translations.BN: স্টেশনে তার সাথে আকস্মিকভাবে দেখা হলো।
translations.ZH: 我在车站偶然遇到了他。
translations.TL: Nagkita kami nang hindi sinasadya sa istasyon.
translations.MY: ဘူတာမှာ တခြေမျှမရှိ ကြုံရတယ်။
translations.HI: स्टेशन पर संयोग से उनसे मिला।
translations.FA: در ایستگاه به طور تصادفی او را دیدم.

contingency.MY: အခိုက်အတန့်

parts_of_speech: Noun, Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
